bylaws

These are the rules that govern the James River Outdoor Coalition

View the Project on GitHub

  1. Attendance. Before agreeing to serve as a Director, each Director must commit to attending and participating in the various Board meetings. Directors who miss more than three (3) consecutive meetings, or more than five (5) meetings during a twelve (12) month period, shall be subject to removal as a Director.

This project is maintained by james-river-outdoor-coalition
